title: 2 Acres of mixed plantation.
details:
2 acres of cultivated mixed plantation for sale. There are pepper and coffee harvesting stage plants.
Many Mango, avocado, and other fruit trees. Lots of Mahogany,teak,halmilla and jak trees.
The property has road access, electricity and water through water board service.
This is a 6 acre property out of which 2 acres is for sale.
This land is situated on the Kandy Hanguranketa road. 10 km from Dalada Maligawa Kandy. 1.5 km from Gurudeniya junction. 1 Km from Kandy City hills housing project.
Present ownership for more than 30 years.
Prepared to sell more than 2 acres if necessary.
Price and extent Negotiable.
